message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $15000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I've already invested a lot in this product and I'm not willing to go as low as $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $17000. This is the best price I can offer for now.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $16000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. However, I still need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you at $16000, but I need to add a small buffer. I'm counteroffering at $16500. This is my final offer for now.
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $16300 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I'm willing to give you a bit more room to maneuver, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $16500. I'm counteroffering at $16400. This is my last concession for now.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $16250 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I've made several concessions already, Bob, and I'm starting to get concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one final offer. I'll sell the product to you for $16300, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $16150 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
